html:
2.17.21  10:54 am   hello i need to do an interview for an art class i have can i interview you

If yes then please answer these questions

How would you describe your art (drawing) in one word?

     billwurtz

     
What kind of art (drawing) do you consider yourself to be making?

     regular

     What do you think makes your art (drawing) different?

     from what

     any tips for aspiring artists (people making drawings)?

     that depends on what the problems seem to be. or, if you haven't had any problems, then i would have no advice yet

     thank you mr bill wurtz sir and have a good day/night

2.17.21  9:39 am   So I am working on a song, and I am trying a method I thought of.
1-Write what you want to be in a song
2-Make it into a song, but don't try to make it good
3-Slowly change a couple of words for it to be better.

Is this a good idea? 

      sure

2.17.21  9:19 am   where do you get your ideas

      from the gutter. if not, i'll check the sewer

2.17.21  8:58 am   How do you write a song

      it's impossible and can't be done. that's exactly why it's so exciting

2.17.21  8:54 am   how to animate?

      sometimes you have to get lost in the wilderness. you will become even more lost when you realize you also have to animate the wilderness

2.17.21  7:40 am   what was the inspiration behind "i'm eating porridge but i've heated it for the wrong amount of time"?

     the bridge section was in danger of losing momentum and getting weak and lost. So i did what any responsible adventurer would do. confess my sins and move along

      actually what was the inspiration behind all of "at the airport terminal"?

     the inspiration for the first line and main melody was just based on a warm pleasant feeling of traveling through an airport terminal. Then, each moment after is inspired by the previous moments in the song so far

2.17.21  8:04 am   How to be yourself even though society thinks it's weird to be yourself? 

     why exactly would that be a problem

2.17.21  7:08 am   Any advice for dealing with chronic pain?

      sing songs of joy

2.17.21  6:53 am   any thoughts ?

      yes

2.17.21  5:27 am   sometimes I like to think there are things that are wrong with me because it makes me feel like a more interesting person. Is it possible to create interesting things without being slightly insane?

      yes

2.17.21  4:23 am   How long does it take you to reply to a question?

      maybe about 1 second, unless the question stirs up some kind of deep conflict in my soul

2.17.21  3:13 am   How do you do on your weekend?

      what the heck is a weekend

2.17.21  2:12 am   when is your next video coming??

      doing it now

2.17.21  1:04 am   What makes creativity?

      you might have to do it

2.17.21  12:23 am   When is silliness serious

      when it's on Earth

2.16.21  11:52 pm   whats your favorite aisle in the grocery store

      14

2.16.21  10:04 pm   How do you come up with the things and characters you draw? Like, does it come randomly or do you think about them?

      i try to go directly to the center of outer space

2.16.21  9:38 pm   Why are ur songs and videos so addictive lol

      could be that they remind you of good times on the farm back home

2.16.21  9:30 pm   your first word was "die",

     that's not true

      your last word (for a while) was "everyone". did you predict the future?

     no

2.16.21  9:01 pm   how do you cope with anxiety?

      do some portraits of the anxiety, not necessarily under that title. actually just do portraits of anything. any type of portrayal or depiction

2.16.21  8:47 pm   What is the secret to your wisdom?

      i'm in a box

2.16.21  8:18 pm   what opinions do you have on film scores?

      powerful secret weapon of the movie

2.16.21  8:10 pm   what do i do if i no longer desire to be in panic mode for  any longer?

      have you considered going into a deep slumber

2.16.21  8:04 pm   Is the language of love different from person to person

      yes, and also the same

2.16.21  7:00 pm   is it possible to make a video without any music?

      yes

2.16.21  6:38 pm   is soup a drink?

      more like a bath

2.16.21  5:17 pm   does it ever get better?

      yes

2.16.21  4:43 pm   Hi Bill! 3 years ago I started my journey to songwriting and now I'm feeling overwhelmed. I finished maybe 2-3 song because I "abandoned" them by finishing without thinking... I think I had luck for these 2-3 songs because I can't even develop my zillion ideas now. When I sit down and play guitar/piano I feel so much tired after 15min... I'm really desperate because I don't know what to do in order to get better.. please help me..

      it sounds like it may be time for a bit of reverse psychology. try making a song that's bad

2.16.21  3:59 pm   what are your thoughts

      very ordinary normal, respectable thoughts

2.16.21  3:31 pm   what fruit do you think you could throw the furthest?

      melon

2.16.21  3:14 pm   Do you have a schedule of when you release your videos? 

      i wish i could make that possible

2.16.21  3:00 pm   do you think the universe has any inherent purpose?

      yes

2.16.21  2:24 pm   do you like jokes what's your favorite joke

      'truth' and 'facts'

2.16.21  2:20 pm   Are you planning on having a set schedule for uploading?

     that would be nice

     If you are how long would it be between songs?

     ideally 1 week

     You're a great musician and can't wait to hear more of your music.

2.16.21  1:57 pm   what is your favorite ocean animal?

      fish

2.16.21  1:56 pm   I'm having some difficulty in sports. Do you ever have difficulty writing music?

     yes

     If so, what do you do to overcome those obstacles

     sometimes i imagine a video scene, for the music to take place in. usually that causes new musical ideas to easily occur to me

     and do you think that can apply to the world of sports? 

     yes

2.16.21  1:04 pm   how do you write lyrics?

      musically

2.16.21  12:17 pm   Why do you like Tuesday?

      so fresh

2.16.21  11:54 am   What do you think is a good size of Object?

     medium

     What is a good weight of an object?

      medium

2.16.21  11:00 am   how fast do you think

      about 3 thoughts per moment

2.16.21  10:05 am   do you enjoy decorative ceiling lamps?

      that all depends on the decoration

2.16.21  9:12 am   who did you shake hands with in pyongyang? (in hello sexy pants)

      both hypothetical and fictional, it was also metaphorical and only a suggestion

2.16.21  9:05 am   Do you ever use non-conventional instruments to record your music (like using bread, the floor, a bowl, or something else strange to make music with)?

      one time i used jeans

2.16.21  8:49 am   what house do ı make

      you might have to make one up

2.16.21  7:05 am   do you ever worry about being judged when you post new content?

      i mostly worry that i'll judge myself

2.16.21  6:27 am   are there any sequences or cadences that you keep coming up in your writing?

     sure

     do you feel like they're a positive and distinctive part of your sound or a crutch you want to move past?

      i surely have some of each

2.16.21  6:19 am   why are you so interesting ?

      it could be the fact that my mind is at war with itself

2.16.21  5:41 am   How do you know if your song is good?

      i actually have no idea

2.16.21  5:22 am   What's your favourite video game, if you have one?

      making videos

2.16.21  3:58 am   Are you good at answering questions?

      sometimes
